subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Whether it is out of superstition or because the N.H.L. regular season is so devalued in comparison with the playoffs, many fans look askance at the notion of their team finishing atop the standings.
snippet: Whether it is out of superstition or because the N.H.L. regular season is so devalued in comparison with the playoffs, many fans look askance at the notion of their team finishing atop the standings.
